sourceOrganization.name: NIAID NBLs/RBLs
sourceOrganization.abstract: The National Biocontainment Laboratories (NBLs) and Regional Biocontainment Laboratories (RBLs) provide high-containment (BSL4/3/2 and BSL3/2) facilities for research on biodefense and emerging infectious diseases. These laboratories support national preparedness and response efforts for infectious disease threats.
sourceOrganization.description: The National Biocontainment Laboratories (NBLs) and Regional Biocontainment Laboratories (RBLs) provide BSL4/3/2 and BSL3/2 biocontainment facilities, respectively, for research on biodefense and emerging infectious disease agents.  For more information, visit the NIAID program page: https://www.niaid.nih.gov/research/biocontainment-research-facilities
